thread.title: The Season's 5 Most Sought-After Accessories - WSJ.com

author: Photography Maciek Pozoga
title: The Season's 5 Most Sought-After Accessories - WSJ.com
text: The Season's 5 Most Sought-After Accessories These playful pieces flash back to a more colorful era Photography by Maciek Pozoga; Styling by Julian Ganio Scroll 1. THE BAGS Pick up a purse to please every palate. Céline bags, cherry, $3,400, black crocodile, price upon request, camel ostrich, $8,500, black coat, $8,200, ivory coat, $8,200, and earrings, price upon request, similar styles available at Céline, 870 Madison Avenue, New York. Photography by Maciek Pozoga; Styling by Julian Ganio 2. THE EARRINGS Hoop dreams come true in a big way. Balenciaga earrings, $595, rose and green, 119 Corbo, 119 Yorkville Avenue, Toronto, turtle, balenciaga​.com, blue, Balenciaga, 840 Madison Avenue, New York, cardigans, $1,050, tops, $695, and pants, $5,200, Balenciaga, 840 Madison Avenue, New York. Photography by Maciek Pozoga; Styling by Julian Ganio 3. THE SCARVES Max out with archival prints from a gilded age. Versace scarves, $195–$395, corset, $1,200, pants, $3,045, belt, $2,475, necklace, $1,225, and bracelet, $1,225, select Versace stores. Photography by Maciek Pozoga; Styling by Julian Ganio 4. THE SHOES Partyworthy pumps make an entrance. Calvin Klein 205W39NYC shoes, $695, red and green coats, $7,500, amber, $5,500, calvinklein​.com. Photography by Maciek Pozoga; Styling by Julian Ganio 5. THE SUNGLASSES A jolt of neon has an electrifying effect. Prada sunglasses, price upon request, dress at left, $2,760, at right, $1,770, select Prada boutiques. Models, Manon Leloup at IMG Models and Tyvanni Osaheni Ebuehi at CODE Model Management; hair, Yuji Okuda; makeup, Anna Sadamori; prop styling, Sophie Durham. Photography by Maciek Pozoga; Styling by Julian Ganio Céline bags, black crocodile, price upon request, cherry, $3,400, camel ostrich, $8,500, similar styles available at Céline, 870 Madison Avenue, New York. Photography by Maciek Pozoga; Styling by Julian Ganio Advertisement
